page.title: 10COOPERVISION OPTIC LTD
page.content: Coopervision makes soft contact lenses.It was opened on 30th April 1984.It is part of a network of factories over the world.The headquarters is in California U.S.A. Coopervision gets almost all of its employees from the local area of Hedge End. New unskilled employees earn Â£5,000 per year for the first six months,and then their wage increases. Employees work a 37\ hour week.Everyone wears a uniform unless they work in an office. Some employees who work in a special 'clean room' have to put on clean overalls,hats and shoes every time they enter. Every employee is given a rule and safety book to read. Coopervision seems to be the only major industry in Hedge End.
